const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "my_locations",
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      location: {
        type: "geo_point",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "my_locations",
  id: 1,
  refresh: "true",
  document: {
    location: "POINT(4.912350 52.374081)",
    city: "Amsterdam",
    name: "NEMO Science Museum",
  },
});
console.log(response1);
